name: Behold Organize File
summary: Learn about .BHO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: BHO files can be opened and edited with Behold, but they can also be viewed with any text editor because they are saved in a plain text format.

description: File created by Behold, a program used for viewing genealogy data; references GEDCOM (.GED) files and specifies family and genealogy display formatting information; used for presenting family trees and other genealogies in different ways.
